1.create project name in git through cmd

echo "# jslibrary" >> README.md
git init
git add README.md
git commit -m "first commit"
git remote add origin https://github.com/aksharma05/jslibrary.git
git push -u origin master

2. set credential through cmd:

E:\work\jslibrary> npm set init-author-name 'ashish'
E:\work\jslibrary> npm set init-author-email 'mypage.vicky@g
E:\work\jslibrary> npm set init-license 'MIT'
E:\work\jslibrary> cat ~/.npmrc
npm save-exact true

3. create account on npm through
https://www.npmjs.com
log in

type in cmd:
npm adduser:
username ...
password...
email: ...
...

4. intialize npm through cmd
   
   1.npm init
     create package.json file 
     craete customer.json file
     create index.js file
     

5. set dependencies through npm:
   npm install --save unique-random-array
   type below commnd in cmd:
  var lib=require('./src/index.js');
  lib.all;
  lib.random();

6. pusing all file in github
